summary: After more than fifteen years of experience in a variety of different industries and professional settings,  I can honestly say I'm comfortable working in every format imaginable. My willingness to explore every opportunity available has allowed me to gain a strong background in everything from online promotions (including social media) and IT development to more traditional communications such as mailing, direct contact and printed materials. Combined with an outgoing personality and a fearless determination towards business development, I often tell people I'm the Marketing Perfect Storm. I enjoy taking the reins and being the champion of projects that may have had problems in the past. Additionally, I’m able to delegate when appropriate and have no problem seeking out information from colleagues that know more about a topic than myself.If you’re hitting a snag with your marketing and communications or are just looking to take things to the next level, I’m an excellent person to contact.Specialties: Marketing, Communications, Public Relations, Project Management, IT Networking, Web 2.0, Online Marketing, Web Marketing, Web Solution, Website Management and Development, Writing, Non-Profit, Real Estate, Healthcare, Disability, Education, International Leadership, Editing, Social Media
